title: ERROR: InvalidStaticInvocation - RouteServiceProvider - Method Router::__construct is not static, but is called statically
body:
(Moved from https://github.com/psalm/psalm-plugin-laravel/issues/22)

In a fresh Laravel project (with an automatically created config file), Psalm finds the following:

> `ERROR: InvalidStaticInvocation - app\Providers\RouteServiceProvider.php:8:36 - Method Illuminate\Routing\Router::__construct is not static, but is called statically
class RouteServiceProvider extends ServiceProvider`

This is surprising, because `Router::__construct` isn't called at all in [`RouteServiceProvider`](https://github.com/laravel/laravel/blob/5ddbfb845439fcd5a46c23530b8774421a931760/app/Providers/RouteServiceProvider.php), especially not in the line defining the class name and its parent class. I don't see that call in the parent class [`Router`](https://github.com/laravel/framework/blob/9425a2f410d05d5bba493f62cff03854a8b19559/src/Illuminate/Routing/Router.php).

Could it be that it's caused by the following [`Macroable`](https://github.com/laravel/framework/blob/9425a2f410d05d5bba493f62cff03854a8b19559/src/Illuminate/Support/Traits/Macroable.php) trait usage:

![grafik](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/495429/76970971-e3d3af80-692c-11ea-97d3-bc4907de3732.png)
([Source](https://github.com/laravel/framework/blob/9425a2f410d05d5bba493f62cff03854a8b19559/src/Illuminate/Routing/Router.php#L30-L34))

```console
$ composer global require laravel/installer
$ laravel new blog
$ cd blog
$ composer require --dev vimeo/psalm
$ vendor/bin/psalm --init
Calculating best config level based on project files
Scanning files...
Analyzing files...

E░░░░░░E░E░░░E░EE

Detected level 3 as a suitable initial default
Config file created successfully. Please re-run psalm.
$ vendor/bin/psalm
Scanning files...
Analyzing files...

░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░E░

ERROR: InvalidStaticInvocation - app\Providers\RouteServiceProvider.php:8:36 - Method Illuminate\Routing\Router::__construct is not static, but is called statically
class RouteServiceProvider extends ServiceProvider


------------------------------
1 errors found
------------------------------
6 other issues found.
You can display them with --show-info=true
------------------------------
```
